Name: HMS Grove
Builder: Swan Hunter, Tyne and Wear, United Kingdom
Badge: On a Field per fess wavy Red and Blue within a spur rowel upwards White, an escallop Gold
Displacement:
1,050 long tons (1,070 t) standard
1,430 long tons (1,450 t) full load
Propulsion:
Two Admiralty 3-drum boilers
Two shaft Parsons geared turbines, 19,000 shp
Speed:
27 knots (50 km/h; 31 mph)
25.5 knots (47.2 km/h; 29.3 mph) full
Armament:
6 × QF 4 in Mark XVI on twin mounts Mk. XIX
4 × QF 2 pdr Mk. VIII on quad mount MK.VII
2 × 20 mm Oerlikons on single mounts P Mk. III
110 depth charges, two throwers, three racks
